headline: 2025-10-27 — Authors of the energy-systems paper (arXiv) propose an interactive energy state-space model that issues intermediate reactive-power control commands in units of VAR to align component interactions for stability.

2025-10-28 — Authors of the energy-systems paper (arXiv) state they implement the intermediate command on the physical layer using Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) or Sliding Mode Control (SMC) to regulate instantaneous power in units of W.

2025-10-29 — Authors of the quadcopter (tilt-rotor) paper (arXiv) use quaternion state feedback to compute motor commands and demonstrate tracking of attitude step commands and a waypoint navigation mission; attitude changes are evaluated in degrees (°) and waypoint position in meters (m).

2025-10-30 — Authors of the quadcopter paper (arXiv) derive control allocation by linearizing the dynamics about hover; the allocation produces actuator-level commands (thrust in newtons, N, and torques in N·m) claimed to be more accurate than existing approaches.
